message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm a bit on a tight budget.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can offer $90 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're still a bit short on budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $90, so I can offer you the product for $105. This is my final counteroffer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can offer $95 for the product. Can you consider this one last offer?
I've already made it clear that $105 is my lowest price, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. If you're not willing to meet me at $105, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
